text: Hi, anyone know if a can import a file css in a custom module
There should be a "Linked Files" section where you choose files from the DM to link to for the module.
Thankyou, but I want use a macros in seccion of css, but it gives me a rendering error
you can't use HubL in the CSS tab of a CM

that will move that CSS to the head in the DOM.
Although, seems like you are importing like "global" variables like used across your main CSS or something like that, if so I would say add it in the main CSS, or if you want to keep it fragmented, use a new CSS and import it to your main CSS file
